name: Quiz World Countries
description:
The quiz contains questions about the countries of the world, their capitals and other features. The game contains more than 250 flags from around the world and more than 700 riddles of varying difficulty!

Players have the option to specify which category of questions they would like to solve, such as flags, capitals, or all of the categories mixed together! Answers to questions can be either single or multiple. There is also a no-time mode where the player can relax and play at their own pace.
